H0.text: What young pharaoh's tomb was discovered in 1922. Pharaoh Akhenaten

H1.text: What young pharaoh's tomb was discovered in 1922. Pharaoh Smenkhkare

H2.text: What young pharaoh's tomb was discovered in 1922. Pharaoh Neferneferuaten

H3.text: What young pharaoh's tomb was discovered in 1922. Kingtut

A4.text: Tutankhamun's tomb was discovered in 1922 by excavators led by Howard Carter and his patron, George Herbert, 5th Earl of Carnarvon.

A5.text: The first step of the tomb's entrance staircase was uncovered on 4 November 1922.

A6.text: Swiss geneticists examine Tutankhamun's genetic profile

A7.text: The tomb of Tutankhamun is located in the Valley of the Kings.

A8.text: The tomb consisted of four chambers and an entrance staircase and corridor.
